Name: St. Ives Compact
ReputationStatements: In these trying times, even the mighty must resort to hiring those such as you. This is a kindness we do to you, mercenary: you serve your betters.
We would not offer you this contract unless we had no other choice, mercenary. As it stands, this is simple: we have a task, and you need money. Accept or don't, it's your choice.
The St. Ives Compact has need of your unit, mercenary. And you have need of our money, I assume. I think this will benefit both of us.
There are few mercenaries House Allard-Liao trusts with tasks like this, Commander. Make certain our faith is not misplaced. We can both profit from this.
Hello, Commander. The St. Ives Compact would like your assistance with a particular matter. In exchange, we will ensure you are well rewarded.

I'm glad you're well, my friend. Once again, House Allard-Liao would like to call upon your prowess. Undertake this task for us, and we will pay you the highest possible rates. I assure you, this is not a contract for lesser warriors.
My old friend, I hope this message finds you well. If you have the time, the St. Ives Compact would once again like to retain your services.
MissionSuccessStatement: House Allard-Liao trusts in two things, Commander: strength and victory. It seems you also understand this vital lesson. The Prime Minister is pleased you've performed so well.
GoodFaithFailureStatement: You fought honourably, Commander, even if you did not prevail. Learn from this lesson and do better next time.
BadFaithFailureStatement: If you cannot accomplish the missions we lay before you, Commander, we will find another mercenary who can! The Prime Minister will hear of your incompetence!
Description: The Compact was formed in 3029 as a direct result of the Fourth Succession War. Duchess Candace Liao, firstborn of Chancellor Maximilian Liao and his heir, fell in love with Justin Xiang Allard, a Federated Suns spy who had infiltrated the Capellan Confederation's spy agency the Maskirovka. Rather than stay in the Capellan Confederation with a double-agent who helped conquer a third of her home nation, she fled and took the St. Ives Commonality with her. It's tenuous position requires careful negotiation and pinpoint strikes to maintain their independence.
